verses.plain: Paul, an apostle, (not of men, neither by man, but by Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead;)

tokens.t: Paul, an apostle, (not of men, neither by man, but by Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead;)

verses.plain: And all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia:

tokens.t: And all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia:

verses.plain: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father, and from our Lord Jesus Christ,

tokens.t: Grace
to you and peace from God the Father, and
our Lord Jesus Christ,

verses.plain: Who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father:

tokens.t: Who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father:

verses.plain: To whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.

tokens.t: To whom
glory for ever and ever. Amen.

verses.plain: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel:

tokens.t: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel:

verses.plain: Which is not another; but there be some that trouble you, and would pervert the gospel of Christ.

tokens.t: Which is not another; but there be some that trouble you, and would pervert the gospel of Christ.

verses.plain: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.

tokens.t: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.

verses.plain: As we said before, so say I now again, If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received, let him be accursed.

tokens.t: As we said before, so say I now again, If any
preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received, let him be accursed.

verses.plain: For do I now persuade men, or God? or do I seek to please men? for if I yet pleased men, I should not be the servant of Christ.

tokens.t: For do I now persuade men, or God? or do I seek to please men? for if I yet pleased men, I should not be the servant of Christ.

verses.plain: But I certify you, brethren, that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man.

tokens.t: But I certify you, brethren, that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man.

verses.plain: For I neither received it of man, neither was I taught it, but by the revelation of Jesus Christ.

tokens.t: For I neither received it of man, neither was I taught
, but by the revelation of Jesus Christ.

verses.plain: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews’ religion, how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God, and wasted it:

tokens.t: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews’ religion, how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God, and wasted it:

verses.plain: And profited in the Jews’ religion above many my equals in mine own nation, being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers.

tokens.t: And profited in the Jews’ religion above many my equals in mine own nation, being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers.

verses.plain: But when it pleased God, who separated me from my mother’s womb, and called me by his grace,

tokens.t: But when it pleased God, who separated me from my mother’s womb, and called
by his grace,

verses.plain: To reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the heathen; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood:

tokens.t: To reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the heathen; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood:

verses.plain: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me; but I went into Arabia, and returned again unto Damascus.

tokens.t: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me; but I went into Arabia, and returned again unto Damascus.

verses.plain: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter, and abode with him fifteen days.

tokens.t: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter, and abode with him fifteen days.

verses.plain: But other of the apostles saw I none, save James the Lord’s brother.

tokens.t: But other of the apostles saw I none, save James the Lord’s brother.

verses.plain: Now the things which I write unto you, behold, before God, I lie not.

tokens.t: Now the things which I write unto you, behold, before God, I lie not.

verses.plain: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia;

tokens.t: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia;

verses.plain: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ:

tokens.t: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ:

verses.plain: But they had heard only, That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed.

tokens.t: But they had heard only, That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed.

verses.plain: And they glorified God in me.

tokens.t: And they glorified God in me.
